评论详情: I love the look and it’s very soft and comfortable
I get so many compliments when I wear this! Comfy & stylish!
Yes the design is a heat transfer, BUT the design, color and details far outweigh that!! Have gotten many compliments!!

I ordered the largest size and according to the size chart it should have been plenty large enough for me... But it runs at least two maybe three sizes smaller than indicated. The fabric is nice. The image on the front is not lined up... Its off center.
This came with brown stains on the sleeves and hem and the tag cut off.
The iron on transfer is cheap and won’t last long if washed in machine.
Just looks cheap, and I know it's a dupe but the print looks so cheap, and it's more like a t shirt. Id rather nothing than this unfortunately.
I love the oversized fit and feel of this sweatshirt - extremely cozy! I wear it with either leggings or skinny jeans. I think it's a definite FP vibe for a fraction of the cost.
Looks kind of cheap but still cute.

I have the FP version of this sweater that I love so wanted to try this as a cheaper option. It’s okay. It’s definitely not even close to the same quality. The fabric is more shirt than sweatshirt and the image on the front is a transfer, not screen-printed on. Size up, it runs small. I’ll probably keep and see how it washes but won’t be ordering another.

This sweater is fire, I love the way it lays on the body !!! I’m usually a small and got a large, I could see you getting away with a medium too honestly. I will have to post a pic of it later. It’s exactly what I was going for though, I love the cozy feel. The texture/material feels good too

I love the sweatshirt, i do wish I would have ordered a size up for a more oversized fit! The medium fits true and yes it’s roomy but I wanted a move oversized fit. The graphic is spot on to the FP one, and so are the thumb holes! Can’t wait to style this!
It took a while to arrive but it is so cute and I will probably get another.
